channel.title: Andrew Flemming on Andrew
channel.description: Recent content in Andrew Flemming on Andrew

item.title: App Privacy Policy
item.description: This policy applies to all information collected or submitted in my various apps for iPhone, iPad, Apple TV, and Apple Watch. Information Collected I do not collect any user data, and none of your data is visible to me in any way. iCloud My apps may store some of your data in Apple’s iCloud service, to enable sync features between all devices signed into your Apple ID. This data is not accessible or visible to me.

item.title: Check
item.description: I created Check in the summer of 2011, and maintained it until its retirement in 2019. Check was an iPad and iPhone list manager that was as simple as it was beautiful. Set in Futura, on simulated stacks of paper, even the most mundane lists came to life as works of art. Finally, your lists could be beautiful. Check would sync your lists between your devices using Apple’s iCloud service. So wherever you are, you could have your shopping lists, to-do lists, bucket lists, or whatever other list you could think of.

item.title: CurlBook
item.description: From its release in 2009 to its retirement in 2018 CurlBook was the premier curling coaching software for iOS, used around the world by national teams, including Curling Canada. Learn more about CurlBook at it’s archived website

item.title: Curling
item.description: 2020 Winterest Mixschpiel Champion 2016 Ontario Silver Tankard runner-up 2015 Winterest Mixschpiel Champion 2010 Ontario Colts Provincial Champion 2007 Ontario Schoolboy Provincial Champion 2005 Ontario Bantam Boy’s Provincial runner-up

item.title: Festivus Grievances
item.description: A silly app for iOS, iPadOS, and watchOS used to keep track of all the ways you’ve been disappointed by the people in your life. You enter grievances all year, and they remain hidden from everyone - even yourself. Keep all that anger bottled up until Festivus dinner and the airing of the grievances! Download from the App Store

item.title: Photography
item.description: Here are a few of my favourite shots from around the world — Dongguan, China — Lisbon, Portugal — Algarve, Portugal — Provence, France — Portugal — Chicago — Chicago — Waterloo, Ontario — Madeira

item.title: SmartBroom
item.description: The SmartBroom — developed and sold by my company Canadian Curling Tools Ltd. — is a powerful tool for curlers interested in improving the effectiveness of their sweeping. It is used by national organizations and curling clubs around the world. Learn more
